function.description: Perform operations on matrices such as multiplication, determinant calculation, and finding the inverse.
function.name: matrix_operations

matrix_a.description: The first matrix as a list of lists.

matrix_b.description: The second matrix as a list of lists.

operation.description: The matrix operation to perform: can be 'multiply', 'determinant', or 'inverse'.

function.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions using sympy, focusing on providing exact answers with fractions or radicals when possible.
function.name: evaluate_math_expressions

function.description: Solve math problems using sympy. Evaluate steps for differentiation, integration, and solving equations.
function.name: solve_math_problem

function.description: Evaluate trigonometric expressions provided as strings, supporting operations like simplification and conversion of degrees to radians.
function.name: evaluate_trig_expressions

expression.description: The trigonometric expression to evaluate, may include degree sign.
